name: ServiceRequestSubCase
comment: Maintains additional information about tasks that are being delegated within the scope of a specific case.
vf short description: Maintains additional information about tasks that are being delegated within the scope of a specific case.

fields.name: ServiceRequestSubCaseSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: ServiceRequestSubCaseKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the service request sub case in ALDM. Each service request sub case key value represents a unique service request sub case. Generated Key based on Service Request Sub Case Source Id

fields.name: ServiceRequestSubCaseDesc
fields.comment: Describes the service request sub case. TroubleTicket.description

fields.name: ServiceRequestSubCaseTitle
fields.comment: Indicates the title of the service request sub case. TroubleTicket.name

fields.name: ServiceRequestStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: ServiceRequestConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: ServiceRequestStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the status changed.

fields.name: ServiceRequestConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the converged status changed.

fields.name: ServiceRequestSeveritySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ServiceRequestPrioritySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ParentServiceRequestCaseSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: QueueSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ServiceRequestSubCaseOpenTime
fields.comment: Indicates the date and time when the service request sub case was created. TroubleTicket.creationDate

fields.name: ServiceRequestSubCaseCloseTime
fields.comment: Indicates the date and time when the service request sub case was closed. TroubleTicket.resolutionDate where TroubleTicket.status = Closed ORFetch Status Close Date from Service Request Case Status History using Service Request Case Key and Service Request Case Status History.status points to Closed //Customization Instruction: Please validate during implementation

fields.name: SubCaseBehaviorInd
fields.comment: Specifies the subcase behavior.For example:- 1=Normal- 2=Administrative subcase

fields.name: ServiceRequestSubCaseElapsedTime
fields.comment: Indicates the time elapsed for a service request sub case (in seconds). Service Request Sub Case Close Time - Service Request Sub Case Open Time//Null Handling : If Case Close Time is not available then use Current Time (System Time)

fields.name: LastUpdatedOwnershipTime
fields.comment: Indicates the date and time when the ownership of service request sub case was last updated.

fields.name: RequiredDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date and time when the service request sub case must be completed. TroubleTicket.requestedResolutionDate

fields.name: LastModifiedTime
fields.comment: Indicates the date and time when the service request sub case was last updated. TroubleTicket.lastUpdate

fields.name: TotalPhoneTimeSpentOnSubCase
fields.comment: Indicates the total time spent on the phone for a sub case. It is calculated from phone logs.

fields.name: TotalResearchTimeSpentOnSubCase
fields.comment: Indicates the total time spent to research a sub case. It is calculated from research logs.

fields.name: PreviousClosingDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date and time when the service request sub case was last closed. It is earlier than the close date, if the case has been closed before.

fields.name: SlaDueDate
fields.comment: Indicates the SLA due date for a service request sub case. TroubleTicket.expectedResolutionDate

fields.name: SubscriberSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ServiceRequestSubCaseId
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the service request sub case in the source system. TroubleTicket.displayId

fields.name: ServiceRequestCaseResolutionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OriginatorEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CurrentEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ServiceRequestSubCaseTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the sub case type.For example, general or administrative. Lookup Service Request Type based on TroubleTicket.ticketType

fields.name: ServiceRequestSubCaseSourceId
fields.comment: Internal object id of the service request sub case. TroubleTicket.id

fields.name: CustomerServiceActivityStateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderReferenceNumber
fields.comment: Indicates the reference number of the order related to a service request sub case.

fields.name: CustomerTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberMainOfferSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AudienceInd
fields.comment: Indicates which audience can view the subcase. TroubleTicket.audience

fields.name: ActualResolutionDate
fields.comment: The date and time the subcase was resolved. TroubleTicket.resolutionDate

fields.name: StatusChangeReasonInd
fields.comment: The reason for changing the status. TroubleTicket.statusChangeReason

fields.name: OriginatorEmployeeName
fields.comment: The employee who created the subcase. TroubleTicket.relatedParty.name where TroubleTicket.relatedParty.referredType = agent and TroubleTicket.relatedParty.role = originator //Customization Instruction: Please validate during implementation.

fields.name: CurrentEmployeeName
fields.comment: The employee currently responsible for the subcase. TroubleTicket.relatedParty.name where TroubleTicket.relatedParty.referredType = agent and TroubleTicket.relatedParty.role = owner //Customization Instruction: Please validate during implementation.

fields.name: SpecificationId
fields.comment: Defines the type or specification of the subcase. TroubleTicket.ticketSpec.id

fields.name: ContactSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BillingArrangementSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: FinancialAccountSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AssignedProductSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: InteractionChannelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
